node.address: Playa Blanca Baru , Baru Island, Colombia

content.value:
Princesa del Mar is located in Baru Island, in one of the most beautiful beaches of Cartagena. An variety of activities can be enjoyed in the surroundings, such as snorkeling and diving.

The beautiful rooms in Princesa del Mar are covered in wood and have access to the beach. The rooms feature views to the sea.

The comfortable guestrooms at Cabaña Princesa del Mar feature a balcony with outdoor furniture, a seating area and shared bathroom facilities.

Guests at Princesa del Mar can unwind in the shared lounge and the cocktail bar. An array of activities can be enjoyed in the surroundings, such as snorkeling and diving. Airport shuttles can be arranged.
Barú is 12 km from Cabaña Princesa del Mar, while Isla del Rosario is 22 km away.

description.description: The Cabana Princesa del Mar is located only a few meters from the sea. The property offers accommodation and a also a restaurant in Playa Blanca. Located a mere metres from the sea, Cabaña Princesa del Mar offers accommodation with a restaurant in Playa Blanca. The picturesque guestrooms at the property are wood-clad and offer direct access to the beach.
